idea-plugin.name: Annotation Doc Helper
idea-plugin.description: Struggling to find annotation usage details while coding in IntelliJ IDEA? Introducing a powerful plugin to simplify your workflow! Double-click any annotation in your code to instantly reveal a pop-up window with comprehensive documentation, including usage examples and best practices. Gain instant access to critical details and supercharge your productivity—an essential tool for every developer. 在使用 IntelliJ IDEA 开发时，注解用法查询是否让你头疼？别担心，这款插件来助力！只需在代码里双击某个注解，就能立即弹出窗口，详细展示该注解的用法。快速获取关键信息，开发效率直线提升，是程序员不容错过的实用工具。
